ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Songs....
ygData.msgSnippet: Doh!  sorry bout that, usually I do.  Yeah my cube-neighbor is steaming now as all casters got new spells except... clerics and magicians.  I see druids and
ygData.messageBody:
Doh! sorry 'bout that, usually I do. Yeah my cube-neighbor is steaming now
as all casters got new spells except... clerics and magicians. I see druids
and shamans get an upgrade to SoW so they won't be whining so much about our
Selo's any more.

Kit

Kit - you must have missed the new "casters favourite": Breeze, slated for
16th level Enchanters, and destined to make them even more popular at an
even lower level. In case you haven't figured it out, it's mini-crack. A
low-level form of clarity....

Talies the Wanderer

P.S. Just a reminder: Please remember to trim replies, and only copy the
specific info you are replying to. Some of our readers use the digest, and
our European readers appreciate the savings on their phone bills...
